name: electron-holochain-template
description: This repository helps get started with electron and holochain

scripts.install-deps: npm install && npm run electron-install && npm run electron-tsc
scripts.user-data-reset: rm -rf user-data && rm -rf user2-data && mkdir user-data user2-data
scripts.web-explore: cd holorea-graphql-explorer && ADMIN_WS_PORT=1234 APP_WS_PORT=8887 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.web: cd web && ADMIN_WS_PORT=1235 APP_WS_PORT=8888 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.web2: cd web && ADMIN_WS_PORT=1236 APP_WS_PORT=8899 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.electron2: cd electron && EH_TEST_USER_2=1 npm run start

author: Connor Turland <connor@sprillow.com>
